snippet: President Obama will accept unlimited donations from corporations - but no money from lobbyists or political action committees - to finance his 2013 inaugural festivities, a spokeswoman for his inaugural committee said Friday.
abstract: President Obama will accept unlimited donations from corporations - but no money from lobbyists or political action committees - to finance his 2013 inaugural festivities, a spokeswoman for his inaugural committee said Friday.

headline.main: Obama Will Accept Corporate Money to Finance Inauguration
